name: EditSignalAssignee
description:
Modify the triage assignee of a security signal.

Use this tool to change the person assigned to handle a security monitoring signal in Datadog. This is helpful when reassigning tasks to different team members for better workload distribution or expertise alignment.

parameters.name: signal_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the security signal to modify its assignee.

parameters.name: assignee_uuid
parameters.description: UUID assigned by Datadog to identify the user account for the signal's assignee.

value_schema.description: UUID assigned by Datadog to this user account.

parameters.name: user_account_handle
parameters.description: The handle for the user account to be assigned the security signal.

value_schema.description: The handle for this user account.

parameters.name: assignee_gravatar_icon
parameters.description: URL for the Gravatar icon associated with the user account.

value_schema.description: Gravatar icon associated to the user.

parameters.name: user_account_numerical_id
parameters.description: Numerical ID assigned by Datadog to the user account. Required for identifying the assignee.

value_schema.description: Numerical ID assigned by Datadog to this user account.

parameters.name: assignee_name
parameters.description: The name for the user account to be assigned the security signal.

value_schema.description: The name for this user account.

parameters.name: signal_version_number
parameters.description: Integer representing the version of the updated signal. If the server-side version is higher, the update will be rejected.

value_schema.description: Version of the updated signal. If server side version is higher, update will be rejected.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.assignee.handle
parameters.description: The handle for this user account.

value_schema.description: The handle for this user account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.assignee.icon
parameters.description: Gravatar icon associated to the user.

value_schema.description: Gravatar icon associated to the user.

parameters.name: data.attributes.assignee.id
parameters.description: Numerical ID assigned by Datadog to this user account.

value_schema.description: Numerical ID assigned by Datadog to this user account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.assignee.name
parameters.description: The name for this user account.

value_schema.description: The name for this user account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.assignee.uuid
parameters.description: UUID assigned by Datadog to this user account.

value_schema.description: UUID assigned by Datadog to this user account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.version
parameters.description: Version of the updated signal. If server side version is higher, update will be rejected.

value_schema.description: Version of the updated signal. If server side version is higher, update will be rejected.
